name: wander (itch) (Tall Montreal)
description:
"The world is cruel, and the only morality in a cruel world is chance. Unbiased, unprejudiced, fair!" - Harvey Dent, Twoface

This is essentially a hack of another coin flipping RPG (Prole by Highland Paranormal Society), adding some major mechanics like XP, skills, character introduction, some death and damage mechanics, and XP as a in-game currency to manipulate results! And its about the size of a playing card! 

PS:  You'd be surprised how many movies use coins as major plot point.
